comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Durazzo "Durrës [aka Durazzo] is the second largest city of Albania located on the central Albanian coast, about 33 km (21 mi) west of the capital Tirana." "During the First World War, the city was occupied by Italy in 1915 and by Austria-Hungary in 1916-1918. It was captured by the Allies in October 1918. Restored to Albanian sovereignty, Durrës became the country's temporary capital between 1918 and March 1920. "
